title: Public Toilets Open Dataset
description: An open dataset about public toilets in the city of Zagreb, Croatia. Available in CSV and JSON format.

address.description: Address of where the toilet is located

city.description: City where the toilet is located

working_hours.description: Time of the day when the toilet is available

unisex.description: Do male and female genders use the same facilities

baby_changing_station.description: Does the toilet contain a room for changing baby diapers

toilets_for_disabled.description: Does the toilet contain toilets for disabled people

regular_toilets.description: How many regular toilets are there

disabled_toilets.description: How many toilets for disabled people are there

maintenance.description: How often does the staff replenish consumables and clean the space

free_of_charge.description: Is the use of the public toilet free

fee_amount.description: How much do you have to pay to use the toilets

review_user_rating.description: Rating which the user gave for the toilet

review_comment.description: Comment which the user gave for the toilet
